spatial_accuracy.notes: General floor plan layout is preserved successfully with accurate room positioning. Minor discrepancies in door swing directions compared to the 2D schematic.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are accounted for including balconies and wet areas. Wall thickness is consistent throughout. Adjacency logic is followed.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of furniture assets, specifically the kitchen island and bedroom configurations. A small TV stand was hallucinated in the living area which was not in the original plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric projection with clean lighting and realistic material textures. Visual clarity is excellent.

detected_errors.description: Inner door swings in the living room and bedrooms do not perfectly match the 2D plan's arc directions.
Hallucinated TV stand and television against the kitchen partition wall not present in 2D layout.
The double entrance door at the bottom of the plan is rendered as two separate single doors with different framing.
